statements: SELECT * FROM imaging_results;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM imaging_results ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, diagnosis FROM imaging_results WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, image_id, diagnosis FROM imaging_results WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM imaging_results WHERE patient_id = '98765432-1011-1213-1415-161718192021';
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE diagnosis = 'Pneumonia';
SELECT patient_id, image_id, diagnosis FROM imaging_results WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE patient_id = 'a7d4a5ee-f2b6-4d6a-8276-a0dd2c0e8b4e' AND diagnosis = 'Fracture';
SELECT diagnosis, image_data FROM imaging_results WHERE robot_id = 'd3ed8838-9335-45f2-803c-0c96c20f7fc1' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM imaging_results;
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, result FROM imaging_results WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT timestamp, patient_id FROM imaging_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE image_id = 10 AND result ILIKE 'cancer%';
SELECT patient_id, result, timestamp FROM imaging_results WHERE patient_id = 5 AND result = 'normal';
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE patient_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT image_id, result FROM imaging_results WHERE result LIKE '%abnormal%'
SELECT * FROM imaging_results WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM imaging_results WHERE result = 'positive'
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM healthcare_robots WHERE purchase_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY robot_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_images;
SELECT patient_id, image_id, image_data FROM patient_images WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_robots WHERE robot_type = 'Surgical';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM healthcare_robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, robot_id, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM robot_activity_logs WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_images;
SELECT patient_id, image_id FROM patient_images WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_robots WHERE robot_type = 'Surgical';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM healthcare_robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM robot_activity_logs WHERE robot_id = '345e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_results;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_results WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT center_name, location FROM imaging_centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, profession FROM medical_staff WHERE profession = 'Surgeon';
SELECT robot_type, manufacturer FROM robotic_systems WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_results;
SELECT * FROM medical_staff WHERE profession = 'Surgeon';
SELECT center_name, location FROM imaging_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, profession, staff_id FROM medical_staff WHERE profession = 'Nurse' OR profession = 'Technician';
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Robotics' AND robot_type = 'Surgical';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_cost DESC;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM HealthcareRobots WHERE robot_type = 'Surgical';
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM RobotTasks WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age < 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM RobotTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending' ORDER BY task_description DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 500 ORDER BY treatment_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, robot_name FROM Patients JOIN HealthcareRobots ON Patients.patient_id = HealthcareRobots.robot_id;
